title: Search Advertising Account
description: Search Advertising Account defines Customer Configuration on Search Advertising Platform.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

repositoryCreatedBy.title: Created by user identifier
repositoryCreatedBy.description: User ID of who created the record.

repositoryLastModifiedBy.title: Modified by user identifier
repositoryLastModifiedBy.description: User ID of who last modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByUser` is set as `createdByUser`.

createdByBatchID.title: Created by batch identifier
createdByBatchID.description: The dataset files in Catalog which has been originating the creation of the record.

modifiedByBatchID.title: Modified by batch identifier
modifiedByBatchID.description: The last dataset files in Catalog which has modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByBatchID` is set as `createdByBatchID`.

createDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was created in the repository, such as when an asset file is first uploaded or a directory is created by the server as the parent of a new asset. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

modifyDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

accountId.title: Account Identifier
accountId.description: Identifier that defines Customer/Client ID setup on the Search Advertising Platform.

currencyCode.title: Currency Code
currencyCode.description: Currency in which this account operates.

accountStatus.title: Account Status
accountStatus.description: Managed Flag indicates whether account is enabled or disabled on search networks.

budget.title: Budget
budget.description: Budget Allocated to the Account acts only as a spend cap across all your campaigns.

searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
searchEngineId.description: The applicatio-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name.
